short.ja: (MV3) 1.新しいタブページとWebページの背景として画像を使用する、2.タブセッションを保存する、3.通常の検索を使用する、4.Webページとローカルカスタマイズ

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
( "manifest_version": 3 )

    1. The Amazing thing is that you can use Any Your Favorite Picture as Any website's or newtab's  background !

   It's easily to set any local picture as  web site's or tab background image. picture can change randomly when fresh or open  new tab overtime set;

   2. Customize and Redesign any website to your own color scheme and themes , like  backgrounds, color schemes, youtube skins, fonts.
 
    And you can Create your own user styles (CSS, the themes for websites) or just modify the default CSS.
   
3. Others Functions:
   Save tab sessions; 
   Save html with css and images;

4. Tips:
   1.set " Allow access to file URLs" in "manage Extensions"
   2.to set local picture as others web site's background,  config css is necessary,and there is default css 
  3.when config css,empty the background url ,but with leave quoting ,like this:  background: url("");
   4.when config picture path ,input pictures full path,like this:
             C:\_Temp\111.png
             C:\_Temp\ttt 01.jpg
